SEARCH
Package io

Class ModelDatabaseController

Object
ModelDatabaseController
public class ModelDatabaseController extends Object
Main interface to handle database. To use: create a new controller, add and open databases to the controller, use addToDatabase, deleteFromDatabase, getIterator, ... . When finished, use closeAllDatabase to persist the databases.

    • getArrayList

      public <M extends Model> ArrayList<M> getArrayList(String modelKeyword) throws Exception
      Get an arraylist reference to the model. Changing the arraylist will also change the database.
      Type Parameters:

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • getEphemeralArrayList

      public <M extends Model> ArrayList<M> getEphemeralArrayList(String modelKeyword) throws Exception
      Get an arraylist reference to the model. Changing the arraylist will NOT change the database.

      Parameters:
